page.title: 09Leisure
page.content: The recreation ground is a sports field and has a playground for toddlers and has a football pitch a hockey pitch and a cricket pitch. There is a mens football league and a league for the under thirteens.They have football training for children that are twelve and under. There is a hockey league and there is usually a game every Sunday.There is a mens and womens hockey league. There is a pavillion it has a changing room and you can buy drinks and biscuits.There are two tennis courts. There are other leisure facilities in Reepham.The Old Brewery has a sauna,a swimming pool,gymnasium and two squash courts.The clubs in Reepham are basketball,cubs,scouts,brownies, guides,football training and judo. There is also a youth club and a lot of places to go fishing.
